verses.roman:
tad-gotraṁ brahmavij jajñe
śṛṇu vaṁśam anenasaḥ
śuddhas tataḥ śucis tasmāc
citrakṛd dharmasārathiḥ

synonyms: tat-gotram—the descendant of Akriya; brahmavit—Brahmavit; jajñe—took birth; śṛṇu—just hear from me; vaṁśam—descendants; anenasaḥ—of Anenā; śuddhaḥ—a son known as Śuddha; tataḥ—from him; śuciḥ—Śuci; tasmāt—from him; citrakṛt—Citrakṛt; dharma-sārathiḥ—Dharmasārathi.
translation: The son of Akriya was known as Brahmavit, O King. Now hear about the descendants of Anenā. From Anenā came a son named Śuddha, and his son was Śuci. The son of Śuci was Dharmasārathi, also called Citrakṛt.
